languages.text: "Не только Вольные Торговцы умеют заводить друзей". {n}Ренегат презрительно фыркает, переводя взгляд на стоящего подле эльдара.{/n} "Впрочем, стоило избавиться от этой дружбы, как только мы ступили за порог Врат Паутины. Никому в этой жизни нельзя доверять. Тем более мерзким ксеносам".

traits.locale_text: "Не только Вольные Торговцы умеют заводить друзей". {n}Ренегат призрительно фыркает, переводя взгляд на стоящего подле эльдара.{/n} "Впрочем, стоило избавиться от этой дружбы, как только мы ступили за порог Врат Паутины. Никому в этой жизни нельзя доверять. Тем более мерзким ксеносам".
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
languages.original_text: "Не только Вольные Торговцы умеют заводить друзей". {n}Ренегат презрительно фыркает, переводя взгляд на стоящего подле эльдара.{/n} "Впрочем, стоило избавиться от этой дружбы, как только мы ступили за порог Врат Паутины. Никому в этой жизни нельзя доверять. Тем более мерзким ксеносам".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders aren't the only ones who know how to make allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Although we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders aren't the only ones who know how to make allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Although we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to make allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Anyhow, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to make allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Anyhow, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「自由開拓者だけが、味方の見つけ方を知っているわけではないということだ」{n}反逆派は小馬鹿にした笑いをこぼすと、自分の脇に立っているアエルダリを見る。{/n}「とにかく、この『同盟』は網辻門を抜けた時点で終了です。卑劣な異種族なんて、誰も信じられないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者だけが、味方の見つけ方を知っているわけではないということだ」{n}反逆派は小馬鹿にした笑いをこぼすと、自分の脇に立っているアエルダリを見る。{/n}「とにかく、この『同盟』は網辻門を抜けた時点で終了です。卑劣な異種族なんて、誰も信じられないでしょう」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “知道如何寻找盟友的人，可不止行商浪人。”{n}叛变的导航者嘲笑着，看着站在他身边的艾达灵族。{/n}“但话说回来，从我们穿过网道的那一刻起，就应该结束我们之间的‘联盟’才对。任何人都不能相信，尤其不能卑劣的异形。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."

traits.locale_text: “知道如何寻找盟友的人，可不止行商浪人。”{n}叛变的导航者嘲笑着，看着站在他身边的艾达灵族。{/n}“但话说回来，从我们穿过网道的那一刻起，就应该结束我们之间的‘联盟’才对。任何人都不能相信，尤其不能卑劣的异形。”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Les libres-marchands ne sont pas les seuls à savoir comment se faire des alliés, » {n}répond le renégat avec un rire dédaigneux en désignant l'Aeldari à ses côtés d'un simple coup d'œil.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, nous aurions dû rompre cette alliance à l'instant même où nous avons traversé le portail sur la Toile. Nous ne pouvons faire confiance à personne. Encore moins à ces maudits xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Les libres-marchands ne sont pas les seuls à savoir comment se faire des alliés, » {n}répond le renégat avec un rire dédaigneux en désignant l'Aeldari à ses côtés d'un simple coup d'œil.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, nous aurions dû rompre cette alliance à l'instant même où nous avons traversé le portail de la Toile. Nous ne pouvons faire confiance à personne. Encore moins à ces maudits xénos. »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «Los Comerciantes Independientes no son los únicos que saben encontrar aliados». {n}El renegado se ríe y mira a los Aeldari que lo flanquean.{/n} «Dicho esto, deberíamos haber puesto fin a esta "alianza" en cuanto atravesamos el Portal de la Telaraña. No se puede confiar en nadie, y mucho menos en xenos despreciables».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Los Comerciantes Independientes no son los únicos que saben encontrar aliados». {n}El renegado se ríe y mira a los Aeldari que lo flanquean.{/n} «En cualquier caso, deberíamos haber puesto fin a esta "alianza" en cuanto atravesamos el Portal de la Telaraña. No se puede confiar en nadie, y mucho menos en xenos despreciables».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Freihändler sind nicht die Einzigen, die wissen, wie man Verbündete findet." {n}Der Abtrünnige hüstelt und blickt auf die Aeldari neben sich.{/n} "Wie dem auch sei, wir sollten uns dieses 'Bündnisses' entledigen, sobald wir das Netzportal durchquert haben. Ihr könnt niemandem vertrauen. Schon gar nicht den schändlichen Xenos."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Freihändler sind nicht die Einzigen, die wissen, wie man Verbündete findet." {n}Der Abtrünnige hüstelt und blickt auf die Aeldari neben sich.{/n} "Wie dem auch sei, wir sollten uns dieses 'Bündnisses' entledigen, sobald wir das Netzportal durchquert haben. Ihr könnt niemandem vertrauen. Schon gar nicht den schändlichen Xenos."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Kim demiş sadece Hür Tacirler müttefik edinebilir diye?" {n}Hain, dudak büküp yanında duran Aeldari'ye bakıyor.{/n} "Yine de Ağyol Geçidi'nden geçer geçmez bu 'ittifak' mevzusuna bir son vermeliydik. İnsan kimseye güvenemiyor. Özellikle de alçak zenolara."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are not the only ones who know how to find allies." {n}The renegade scoffs and looks at the Aeldari standing beside him.{/n} "Saying that, we should have rid ourselves of this 'alliance' the moment we crossed the Webway Gate. You can trust no one. Least of all the vile xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Kim demiş sadece Hür Tacirler müttefik edinebilir diye?" {n}Hain, dudak büküp yanında duran Aeldariye bakıyor.{/n} "Yine de Ağyol Geçidi'nden geçer geçmez bu 'ittifak'tan kurtulmalıydık. İnsan kimseye güvenemiyor. Özellikle de alçak zenolara."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
